title: BBC Director-General broadcasts new net zero ambitions

title: Target Setting Protocol: Investor group worth $5.1tr unveils 2025 portfolio decarbonisation goals

title: Barclays' UK retirement fund to screen for climate risk in £1.3bn growth portfolio

title: BYD and ADL to expand UK electric bus manufacturing operations

title: Study: Urban air quality improved less during Covid-19 lockdown than previously thought

title: Is laundry fuelling the marine plastics crisis?
lead: A new study from Canadian non-profit Ocean Wise has shown that synthetic fibres, many released from clothing and textiles during domestic laundry, make up a large proportion of microplastics in the Arctic Ocean ...

title: 'Climate pariah': Campaigners urge Blackrock to strengthen coal exclusion policy after counting $85bn of coal investments

title: Verdantix expands ESG research practice to meet surging demand for green tech
